document.full_text: the city of detroit, which has suffered decline as its automakers struggled through economic hardship, has dropped out of the top ten largest u.s. cities since 2000, according to 2010 census data released on thursday.
document.title: detroit off ten biggest u.s. cities, replaced by san jose
lines_and_colors: the city of detroit, which has suffered decline as its automakers struggled through economic hardship, has dropped out of the top ten largest u.s. cities since 2000, according to 2010 census data released on thursday.
